t: Amazon reportedly considering mall space for fulfillment centers - The Verge
s: August 9, 2020 - Amazon reportedly has had talks with Simon Property Group about converting some of its mall spaces into fulfillment centers. The conversations started before the coronavirus pandemic, and before the latest wave of bankruptcy filings by mall stalwarts like Lord & Taylor, JCPenney, and Nieman Marcus.

t: Simon shares jump on reported talks with Amazon. But converting stores to warehouses may face hurdles
s: August 10, 2020 - Real estate analysts say a deal between Amazon and Simon Property Group could be positive for the biggest U.S. mall owner in the near term, but there would be hurdles.
